Description.Name: Striker
Description.Details: The Striker received a major refit during the 3040s, its Internal Combustion Engine was replaced with a Fusion Engine. Ferro-Fibrous Armor replaced the original's standard armor. The Vehicle's LRM launcher was upgraded to an LRM-15, and further enhanced with an Artemis IV fire control system. The original, larger SRM launcher is exchanged for a pair of Streak SRM-2 Launchers, fed by a single ton of ammunition. The Striker Light Tank started out as a joint project venture between Valiant Systems and Wunderland Enterprises on the world of Johnsondale. They united in their efforts to create a joint company known as Valiant Vehicles, with the Striker being their first product. The low cost light fire support tank became a mainstay of the AFFS after its introduction in the first decade of the thirty-first century, and orders for the Striker soon outstripped the Valiant production line's capacity. Fusion: Expensive engine that works in a Vacuum. Movement: 5/8 Hex: 150/240 Meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 165 20 Left 130 20 Right 130 20 Rear 105 20 Turret 140 20 Total 670 100 Quirk: Accurate Weapon - Missiles

YangsThoughts: It's a tank, Boss, they all look the same to me.
